Viserys Targaryen (disambiguation)027431dntv6xqyrisiwp0swv2mubbqf62wciv1595352014-09-15T15:09:42ZDaemon Targaryen24097499{{disambig|Targaryen, Viserys}}
'''Viserys Targaryen''' can refer to:

*King [[Viserys I Targaryen]], the fifth king of the [[House Targaryen|Targaryen dynasty]]. He was the grandson (and direct successor) of King [[Jaehaerys I Targaryen]], who was himself the grandson of King [[Aegon I Targaryen|Aegon the Conqueror]]. Father of [[Rhaenyra Targaryen|Rhaenyra]] and [[Aegon II Targaryen|Aegon II]].
*King [[Viserys II Targaryen]], youngest son of Rhaenyra Targaryen, and grandson of King Viserys I. Viserys II was the younger brother of King [[Aegon III Targaryen|Aegon III]].
*Prince [[Viserys Targaryen]], son of King [[Aerys II Targaryen]] (commonly known as the Mad King), who as his father's successor in exile styled himself as "'''King Viserys III'''" in opposition to the usurper King [[Robert Baratheon]]. Younger brother of [[Rhaegar Targaryen]] and older brother of [[Daenerys Targaryen]].
[[Category:Disambiguations]]
